list.abs: America has several thriving rent-a-chaplain companies and two seminaries that offer degrees in corporate chaplaincy , yet demand still exceeds supply .美国有几家生意红火的牧师租借公司，两个神学院为这些公司的牧师提供企业牧师职位所需的学位证书，然而仍然供不应求。
